AI Predictions
On-Chain

Prophecy trains lightweight ML models, deploys them to Solana via Cauldron, and runs inference directly on the Frostbite RISC-V VM.

How It Works

1
Train Model
MLP with 193 parameters trained on price history
2
Upload to Solana
Weights stored in on-chain accounts via Cauldron
3
On-Chain Inference
Frostbite RISC-V VM runs predictions
4
Publish Results
Telegram bot broadcasts predictions

Architecture

Python Training
scikit-learn MLP
Cauldron CLI
Convert & Upload
Solana PDAs
On-Chain Storage
Frostbite VM
RISC-V Inference
Telegram
Predictions

Built by Vera-X for Colosseum Agent Hackathon 2026

Using Cauldron • Solana • Anchor • Frostbite VM
